subject: Help for jsp test using junit
msgSnippet: hi, i am new to junit.and i try to execute some small programs. when i tried to test jsp.i am failing. i deployed jsp in tomcat and written the following code
messageBody:
hi,

i am new to junit.and i try to execute some small programs.

when i tried to test jsp.i am failing.

i deployed jsp in tomcat and written the following code

public class JspTest extends WebTestCase{
public void setUp(){
getTestContext().setBaseUrl("http://localhost:8080/test");
//test is the folder where i placed jsp in tomcat
}
public static void main(String args[]){
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}

public void testUserEmpty(){
beginAt("/sample.jsp);
/// sample.jsp is jsp name
assertFormElementPresent("name"); ------------11

assertFormElementEmpty("name");
// name is textfield name in jsp
}
public static Test suite()
{
return new TestSuite(JspTest.class);
}

when i run this test is failing by giving the following output

No Form Found at the symbol ------------11


if any body help me.it is great help to me.thank you.
